title: Worried?
detail_text: <:th_ch0212/>Shioriko, come on, pull yourself together already.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>But.... but.... I don’t know if I should do this.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>This? Aah, you mean the triple cheeseburger with two extra bacon?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>It’s 3 times the patties and cheese and 2 times the bacon. Is this really for me?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Fufu, well, I guess you would be surprised, Shioriko. But this is normal in the states, you know? Look, doesn’t it look suuuper good?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>....Yes, it does.<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Then just try it, take a bite! Enjoy the fries while they’re still hot. We got some coke too!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Uuu.... But....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0212/>Come on, you’re not gonna get fat from this much!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0210/>Eh? Get fat? I’m only worried about whether I can finish all of it or not. But, now that it’s in front of me, I can’t really turn it down, can I? Thanks for the food! ....Delicious, it’s the best~!!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
